funfacts: The population of Kansas is 2.9 million since 2019.
Kansas is known as the Sunflower State.
The state bird of Kansas is the Western Meadowlark.
The population of Missouri is 6.1 million since 2019.
Missouri is known as the Show-Me State.
The state bird of Missouri is the Eastern Bluebird.
The population of Oklahoma is 3.9 million since 2019.
Oklahoma is known as the Sooner State.
The state bird of Oklahoma is the Scissor-tailed Flycatcher.
The population of Nebraska is 1.9 million since 2019.
Nebraska is known as the Cornhusker State.
The state bird of Nebraska is the Western Meadowlark.
The population of Colorado is 5.8 million since 2019.
Colorado is known as the Centennial State.
The state bird of Colorado is the Lark Bunting.
